featured.text: He viewed the kidnapping as a wonderful camping trip.

definition.zh_def: 綁架，非法拘留他人以索取贖金或其他利益的行為。
definition.en_def: The act of unlawfully seizing and carrying away a person by force or fraud, often to obtain a ransom.
definition.example: The police launched an investigation into the recent kidnapping case.
